mapper.select: SELECT BOARDNO, BOARDTITLE, BOARDAUTHOR, BOARDVIEW FROM T_BOARD ORDER BY BOARDNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD(BOARDTITLE, BOARDAUTHOR, BOARDCONTENTS, CREATE_DATETIME, BOARDUSERID) VALUES (@BOARDTITLE, @BOARDAUTHOR, @BOARDCONTENTS, GETDATE(), @BOARDUSERID)
mapper.select: SELECT BOARDNO, BOARDTITLE, BOARDAUTHOR, BOARDVIEW, BOARDCONTENTS, CREATE_DATETIME, BOARDUSERID FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARDNO = @BOARDNO
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET BOARDTITLE=@BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENTS=@BOARDCONTENTS WHERE BOARDNO=@BOARDNO
UPDATE T_BOARD SET BOARDVIEW=BOARDVIEW+1 WHERE BOARDNO=@BOARDNO;
mapper.select: SELECT REPLYID, BOARDNO, REPLYCONTENTS, REPLYCREATETIME, BOARDREPLYUSERNAME, REPLYREPLY FROM T_BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARDNO=@BOARDNO ORDER BY REPLYID;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD_REPLY(BOARDNO, REPLYCONTENTS, REPLYCREATETIME, BOARDREPLYUSERNAME, REPLYREPLY) VALUES(@BOARDNO, @ReplyContents, GETDATE(), @BOARDREPLYUSERNAME, 'N');
